DOC.HEAD: Quayle Christmas Cards Contain Misspelled Word
DOC.TEXT: INDso AM-Panama-Quotes, AM-Panama-Information Line, AM-Panama-Pentagon Pool, AM-Panama-Grenada, all from WASHINGTON, and other separates as they develop.
DOC.HEAD: ROMANIA: Clashes Spread to Other Cities; Ceausescu Returns
DOC.TEXT:
VIENNA, Austria _ Bloody weekend clashes in western Romania that reportedly killed hundreds apparently have spread to other cities in the sealed-off Communist nation. President Nicolae Ceausescu, whose harsh rule sparked the protests, returns from Iran to a characteristically lavish official welcome. Slug AM-Romania. Developing. By Alison Smale.
With: _ AM-Romania-Opposition from VIENNA: Opposition to Ceausescu is centered in the ethnically diverse region of Transylvania and the northern area of Moldavia. New. _ AM-Romania-Reax from VIENNA: International condemnation of Romania's crackdown on unarmed anti-government protesters continues to pour in. Developing.
DOC.HEAD: CZECHOSLOVAKIA: Party Admits Mistakes, Urbanek Says He's Guilty
DOC.TEXT: PRAGUE, Czechoslovakia _ Communist Party leader Karel Urbanek said Wednesday the party leadership had made mistakes marked by ``negligence and irresponsibility'' that led the party into its worst crisis. Speaking at an extraordinary party conference that is expected to sweep away its discredited leadership, Urbanek admitted his own guilt as a member of the ruling Politburo in allowing hard-liners to cling to power. Slug AM-Czechoslovakia. New material, should stand. 700 words. By roved documents Wednesday calling for a split with Moscow on their way to a formal break with the Soviet Communist Party that leader Mikhail S. Gorbachev has struggled to avoid. Slug AM-Lithuania. By Mark J. Porubcansky.
DOC.HEAD: HOSPITALS-MORTALITY: High Death Rates at 3 Percent of Hospitals
DOC.TEXT:
WASHINGTON _ More than 3 percent of the nation's hospitals have death rates for Medicare patients higher than would normally be expected for such people, the government reports. Thirty-two hospitals, including six in Puerto Rico, have had high rates three straight years. Slug AM-Hospitals-Mortality. New material. 600 words. By Deborah Mesce.
With: _ AM-Mortality-List from WASHINGTON. _ AM-Hospital Deaths from BOSTON: People are most likely to die from their illnesses when admitted to osteopathic, public or profit-making hospitals, while private hospitals affiliated with medical schools offer the best chance of getting well, a new study concludes. For release 6 p.m. EST.
DOC.HEAD: MAIL BOMBS: Jacksonville Scare Recalls Earlier Tensions There
DOC.TEXT:
JACKSONVILLE, Fla. _ Blacks leaders say they're angry about a potentially deadly bomb mailed to the local headquarters of the NAACP in an incident that recalled earlier tensions in the city such as the one sparked by a busing controversy and the arrest of a black city councilwoman absent from a council meeting. Slug AM-Mail Bombs-Jacksonville. Developing. By Ron Word. LaserPhoto staffing.
With AM-Mail Bombs from MOUNTAIN BROOK, Ala.: Squadrons of police and bomb-sniffing dogs provided tight security Wednesday as mourners paid their respects to US District Judge Robert Vance, first person killed in a series of mail bombs. Developing. LaserPhoto staffing.
DOC.HEAD: CRASH TRIAL: Closing Arguments for Bus Driver in Kentucky
DOC.TEXT: CARROLLTON, Ky. _ Larry Mahoney will forever punish himself for causing a bus crash that killed 27 people, but Ford Motor Co. was the real culprit, Mahoney's lawyers say in closing arguments Wednesday. Slug AM-Bus Crash Trial. Developing. By Charles Wolfe.
DOC.HEAD: SCROOGE LIVES! Appalling Tales From the Underside of Christmas
DOC.TEXT: UNDATED _ `Tis the season for human folly, or, as the sign in the New York City bus depot puts it: ``The holidays are here. PLEASE! Watch your belongings.'' With that in mind, we present our nominations for the 1989 Ebenezer Scrooge Awards, given just this once to those who best exemplify the seamy underside of the Christmas spirit. Slug AM-Scrooge Awards. New, should stand. 550 words. By Mitchell Landsberg.
